mapper.insert: insert into project_test.erratum ( word, translation, date, reason) VALUES (#{word},#{translation},#{date},#{reason})
mapper.delete: delete from project_test.erratum where id = #{id} collate utf8mb4_bin
delete from project_test.erratum where translation = #{translation} collate utf8mb4_bin
mapper.select: select * from project_test.erratum order by date collate utf8mb4_bin
